info.+content: Lamù e i casinisti planetari - Urusei Yatsura

Urusei Yatsura is the story of the unluckiest and most lecherous young man alive, Ataru Moroboshi. When aliens decide to invade Earth, Ataru is randomly selected to defend his planet by playing a game of the aliens' national sport, tag. Should he win, the world shall be saved. However, Ataru is motivated for far less noble reasons, as the one he plays against is revealed to be the curvaceous alien princess, Lum. The game goes for 10 days, and on the last day, Ataru, motivated by his girlfriend assuring him marriage (and consequently, a marriage night one can assume) should he win, finally catches Lum. However, with his victory he gives a cry of joy for his coming marriage, which is misinterpreted by Lum to be a marriage proposal. She promptly agrees, beginning the two's "marriage" together. (from manga)
#2: "Ai Wana Muchuu" (アイワナムチュー) by MAISONdes feat. asmi, THR333 (eps 12-23)
"Tokyo Shandy Rendezvous" by MAISONdes feat. KAF, Tsumiki

"I-ke-na-i Rouge Magic" (い・け・な・いルージュマジック) by Kiyoshirō Imawano, Ryūichi Sakamoto (ep 18)
"Lum no Love Song" (ラムのラブソング) by Lum [Sumire Uesaka] (ep 23)
